name: The 5th Annual Conference on Engineering and Information Technology
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), Annual Conference on Engineering and Information Technology (ACEAIT) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of engineering, information technology and beyond. 2017 ACEAIT will take place from March 29-31, 2017 in Nagoya,Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://aceait.org or contact: aceait@aceait.org
